original_text: As John’s disciples were leaving, Jesus began to speak to the crowd about John: “What did you go out into the wilderness to see? A reed swayed by the wind?
korean_text: 그들이 떠나매 예수께서 무리에게 요한에 대하여 말씀하시되 너희가 무엇을 보려고 광야에 나갔더냐 바람에 흔들리는 갈대냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus began to speak to the crowd
What did you go out into the wilderness to see?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 광야에 나가 보려고 무엇을 보았느냐?

sentences.original_text: A reed swayed by the wind?
